identification.description: Specifies the local party status of a party under Canadian Securities            Administrators (CSA).

codes.description: Indicates the organization referenced by the partyTradeInformation with                    respect to the reporting Regime is a Local Party, for example in Canadian                    reporting.
Indicates the organization referenced by the partyTradeInformation with                    respect to the reporting Regime is a Non Local Party, for example in Canadian                    reporting.
